getUniswapFeeTiers().details: If a new fee tier is added, anyone can add it using the 'newUniswapFeeTier' function.

initialize(address,address).details: Anyone can call it, but it's a no-op if already initialized.

state(address,address).details: The tokens must be sorted lexicographically.

uniswapFeeTierAddressOf(address,address).details: The order of the tokens does not matter.

uniswapFeeTierOf(address,address).details: The order of the tokens does not matter.

updateOracleState(address,address).details: This function also checks periodically if there is a better fee tier.

returns.tickPriceX42: TWAP price of the pair of tokens

getPrice(address,address).notice: Returns the TWAP price for the collateralToken-debtToken pair.

getUniswapFeeTiers().notice: Function for getting all the uniswap fee tiers.

initialize(address,address).notice: Initializes the oracleState for a pair of tokens.

newUniswapFeeTier(uint24).notice: Anyone can let SIR know that a new fee tier exists in Uniswap V3

state(address,address).notice: Returns the state of the oracle for the pair of tokens.

uniswapFeeTierAddressOf(address,address).notice: Returns the address of the uniswap pool for the pair of tokens.

uniswapFeeTierOf(address,address).notice: Returns the uniswap fee tier of the pair of tokens.

updateOracleState(address,address).notice: Updates the oracle price for a pair of tokens, so that calls in the same block don't need to call Uniswap again.
